comprehensive_overview: GNU Linear Programming Kit (GLPK) is an open-source software package for solving large-scale linear programming (LP), mixed integer programming (MIP), and other related problems. It is designed with an emphasis on flexibility, portability, and ease of use.
core_features: Supports mixed integer programming and related problems
Offers both a high-level and low-level C API for problem input and output
Includes tools for post-processing and sensitivity analysis
